organisation_name: Unie professionele Tranporteurs en Logistieke Ondernemers (UPTR)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: UPTR is an Belgian professional tranport federation representing Belgian road hauliers en logistic compagnies on a regional, national en EU level. UPTR offers its membres a wide range of administrative services, legal services and information updates in order to lighten the burden of administration that today's transport compagnies are required to deal with. UPTR has got a lobby and representation mission to ameliorate the Belgian road hauliers economic position on the Belgian en Eupean market.
relevant_communication:
UPTR is a founding membre of the European Road hauliers Association (UETR) 
 
UETR is primarly represents and promotes the interests of MSM's in the road transport sector in their relations with decision-making bodies of the EU. 
 
UETR continously evalutes recent negative developments (fall in demand, fuel cost increases, long terms of payment) and develop approciate strategies. 
UETR works towards ensuring a stronger, more flexible, competitive an substainable road transport sector in wich its membres are confidently able to face current and future challenges.
